text: Pyeongchang is a city in the Republic of Korea. They hosted the 2018 Winter Olympics and the 2018 Winter Paralympics."S. Korean city to host 2018 Winter Olympics" CNN. 6 July 2011. Retrieved 6 November 2011 The town has many mountains, with a lot of snow in the winter. As of 2013, its population was about 44,000. ==References== ==Other websites== * Pyeongchang County government website * Pyeongchang 2018 website Category:Cities in South Korea
title: Pyeongchang
